metadata.title: CVE-2015-8748 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Radicale before 1.1 allows remote authenticated users to bypass owner_writeand owner_only limitations via regex metacharacters in the user name, asdemonstrated by ".*".

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8748` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-radicale - 1.1.1-1
python3-radicale - 1.1.1-1
radicale - 1.1.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: radicale package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.1.1-1').
